purpleculture_pinyin:
chuǎn
to gasp; to pant; asthma
задыхаться; тяжело дышать; астма
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 耑 indicates the sound; 口 (mouth) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
喘息 [ chuǎn xī ]: to gasp for breath; to take a breather
喘气 [ chuǎn qì ]: to breathe deeply; to pant
哮喘 [ xiào chuǎn ]: asthma
气喘 [ qì chuǎn ]: to gasp for breath; asthma
残喘 [ cán chuǎn ]: remaining breath; last gasp
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 口 [ kǒu ] mouth; entrance, gate, opening
    • 耑 [ duān ] specialized; concentrated
heisig_chinese_memo: I left my favorite comb on the mountain top so I went all the way back up to get it but my mouth was gasping for air and my chest was wheezeing by the end.  Damn asthma!
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you rake (而) the mountain (山) your mouth (口) would be gasping
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: I left my favorite comb on the mountain top so I went all the way back up to get it but my mouth was gasping for air and my chest was wheezeing by the end.  Damn asthma!
humanum_full_description_en:
From the " mouth ", the sound of "耑", the original meaning is rapid breathing. "Shuowen": "Sickness. From the mouth, the sound of chuckles." "Han Shu-Bingji Biography": "Auspicious travels, everybody chases the cow, and the cow is gasping.

" Pant " also refers to breathing in general. "Eastern View of the Han Dynasty-Jingyin Song Empress Biography": "When you hear a child cry, pity you, look at you as you go. There are flying birds, with wings covered, sand and stones full of mouth, nose can breathe, and the heart is strange. "

" Breathe " may refer to asthma. "Suwen‧ Five Changzheng Dalun": "He is coughing and wheezing."

" Pant " also refers to breath. Tang Dufu "Xingci Zhaoling": "The disasters of the past are still falling, and the common people are still suffering."

" Pant " also means speaking softly. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "Ritual and righteousness are literary, ethics and ethics are reasoned, and when speaking of breath, they are moving with excitement."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " mouth ", the sound of "耑", the original meaning is rapid breathing.
humanum_full_description:
從「口」，「耑」聲，本義為急促呼吸。《說文》：「疾息也。从口，耑聲。」《漢書‧丙吉傳》：「吉前行，逢人逐牛，牛喘吐舌。」

　　「喘」也泛指呼吸。《東觀漢記‧敬隱宋皇后傳》：「聞有兒啼聲，憐之，因往就視。有飛鳥，紆翼覆之，沙石滿其口，鼻能喘，心怪偉之。」

　　「喘」可指氣喘。《素問‧五常政大論》：「其發欬喘。」

　　「喘」還指氣息。唐杜甫〈行次昭陵〉：「往者災猶降，蒼生喘未蘇。」

　　「喘」也表示輕聲說話。《荀子‧臣道》：「禮義以為文，倫類以為理，喘而言，臑而動。」楊倞注：「喘，微言。」
humanum_short_description: 從「口」，「耑」聲，本義為急促呼吸。

Meaning: wheeze
Story: I left my favorite comb on the mountain top so I went all the way back up to get it but my mouth was gasping for air and my chest was wheezeing by the end. Damn asthma!
Kind: both

從「 口 」，「 耑 」聲，本義為急促呼吸。《說文》：「疾息也。从口，耑聲。」《漢書‧丙吉傳》：「吉前行，逢人逐牛，牛喘吐舌。」 「 喘 」也泛指呼吸。《東觀漢記‧敬隱宋皇后傳》：「聞有兒啼聲，憐之，因往就視。有飛鳥，紆翼覆之，沙石滿其口，鼻能喘，心怪偉之。」 「 喘 」可指氣喘。《素問‧五常政大論》：「其發欬喘。」 「 喘 」還指氣息。唐杜甫〈行次昭陵〉：「往者災猶降，蒼生喘未蘇。」 「 喘 」也表示輕聲說話。《荀子‧臣道》：「禮義以為文，倫類以為理，喘而言，臑而動。」楊倞注：「喘，微言。」
From the " mouth", the sound of " 耑", the original meaning is rapid breathing. "Shuowen": "Sickness. From the mouth, the sound of chuckles." "Han Shu-Bingji Biography": "Auspicious travels, everybody chases the cow, and the cow is gasping. " Pant" also refers to breathing in general. "Eastern View of the Han Dynasty-Jingyin Song Empress Biography": "When you hear a child cry, pity you, look at you as you go. There are flying birds, with wings covered, sand and stones full of mouth, nose can breathe, and the heart is strange. " " Breathe" may refer to asthma. "Suwen‧ Five Changzheng Dalun": "He is coughing and wheezing." " Pant" also refers to breath. Tang Dufu "Xingci Zhaoling": "The disasters of the past are still falling, and the common people are still suffering." " Pant" also means speaking softly. "Xunzi·Chen Dao": "Ritual and righteousness are literary, ethics and ethics are reasoned, and when speaking of breath, they are moving with excitement."

喘字的基本解释

喘
chuǎn
急促地呼吸：喘气。喘息。喘咳。苟延残喘。

喘字的汉语字典释义

[①]［chuǎn］
［《廣韻》昌兗切，上獮，昌。］
亦作“歂1”。
(1)急促地呼吸。
(2)泛指呼吸。
(3)指气喘。
(4)气息。
(5)轻声说话。

喘字的英文翻译

◎ 喘
asthma, breathe heavily

喘字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　喘； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页198第30
【唐韻】昌沇切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】尺兗切，?音舛。【說文】疾息也。【廣韻】喘息。【史記·倉公傳】令人喘逆氣不能食。【前漢·王褒傳】匈喘膚汗。【揚子·方言】譴喘，轉也。【集韻】或作歂。　又【正韻】微言。【荀子·臣道篇】喘而言。　又或作端。【荀子·勸學篇】端而言。【註】端讀爲喘。

喘字的源字形

喘字的起名意思

暂无。

asthma
Name meaning
Nothing.
形声字。口表意,其形像张开的口,表示张开口急促呼吸;品(duan)表声,崙像草木上长貌,表示喘是腹内之气不断上
涌。本义是急促呼吸。
①急促呼吸:气~如牛。②气喘的简称:哮~。
~气 ~息 ~吁吁 残~ 发~气~ 痰~ 余~
止~ 气~吁吁 吴牛~月 荷延残~
chuăn
晓喘喘
楷
Пиктофонетические символы.
Рот выражает смысл, его образ подобен открытому рту, что означает, что вы открываете рот и быстро дышите; Пин (дуан) выражает свой звук как растительность на нем, что означает, что дыхание - это постоянный подъем воздуха в брюшная полость.
Первоначальное значение - учащенное дыхание.
①Быстрое дыхание: ци ~ как корова.
②Короткое описание астмы: Asthma ~.
~ Дыхание ~ Дыхание ~ Инвалидность ~ Жир ~ Дыхание ~ Мокрота ~ Ю ~
Стоп ~ Дыхание ~ Обращение Ву Ню ~ Юэ Хэ мертва ~
